title: Are there any better headphones for the person to listen to music in their 30's and hear it better then from ordinary headphones? - Quora

response.answer_text: The traditional best headphones for accuracy are the Stax electrostatic headphones. Nowadays there are alternative Electrostatic headphones, and planar magnetic headphones, both of which are said to be very accurate. And of course there are the Bose noise cancelling headphones, the only kind I personally use, and only on airplanes! Of course none of these come cheap…
Thanks for the A2A. I recently got a pair of Even headphones and found them to be amazing. They tailor the sound to you, which I think will make the sound better for each person.
Bose quiet comfort headphones. It cancels out any noises around and delivers pure musical notes. Check it out.
In the absence of pathology, people in their thirties don’t need special sound systems.
You only have to know ONE brand……..SENNHEISER ………the rest are shit by comparison.
